question:
Consider the following defence equipments with their origin countries:
  1. Dassault Rafale - France
  2. SPYDER - Israel
  3. Barak 8 - Russia
Which of the above pairs is/are correctly matched?
explanation:
• Barak 8 is an Indian-Israeli surface-to-air missile.
  • SPYDER is an Israeli short and medium range mobile air defence system.
  • Dassault Rafale is a French multirole fighter aircraft.
